articles.description: In Mumbai Metropolitan Region and Bengaluru, there has been a rise by 15-20% each in residential rentals as compared to pre-Covid period of 2019. In NCR, there has been a 10-15% rise in the period, while in Pune it is anywhere between 10-20%. Kolkata and Hyde…
articles.content: If you have a vacant space in your home or a property you dont use, it is just the right time to reap yields and add to your income by letting out the space. The housing segment has been on the rise … [+4867 chars]
